message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm initially offering it at $15,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $10,000 is significantly below its true value. Let's meet in the middle - how about $13,500?
I understand your perspective, but $13,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise, but I can only go up to $11,500. Can we meet at this price?
